metadata.title: CVE-2008-5146 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: add-accession-numbers in ctn 3.0.6 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the /tmp/accession temporary file.

notes.note: jdstrand> per Debian, affected code is in example script

criterions.comment: ctn package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
